code: import{createAction}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';export var pushNotification=createAction('sharedAction/pushNotification');export var readNotification=createAction('sharedAction/readNotification');export var deliverNotification=createAction('sharedAction/deliverNotification');export function pendingNotification(requestId,description){return{requestId:requestId,read:false,delivered:false,status:'pending',title:'Pending',description:description,kind:null};}export function fulfilledNotification(requestId,description){return{requestId:requestId,read:false,delivered:false,status:'success',title:'Complete',description:description,kind:null};}export function notifyPending(requestId,message){return pushNotification(pendingNotification(requestId,message));}export function notifyFulfilled(requestId,message){return pushNotification(fulfilledNotification(requestId,message));}
